about.title: About me
about.name: I'am Serhii
about.fstText: I’m a frontend developer passionate about building adaptive and user-friendly web interfaces. My journey into IT began with graphic design courses, then QA testing, and eventually led me to web development — where creativity meets logic.
about.sText: I enjoy turning ideas into interactive experiences with clean, well-structured code and thoughtful design. I follow development best practices and love bringing order and clarity to every project.
about.tText: Currently, I’m focused on growing as a frontend developer, with plans to transition into fullstack — expanding my knowledge of backend and application architecture.
about.fthText: Always open to meaningful collaborations and challenges that help me grow.
